message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal for both of us. This product is worth a lot more to me, but I'm willing to compromise to make this work.  Let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $900,000?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $900,000 is still a bit lower than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go down to $950,000 to make this deal work. This is a very fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $950,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $920,000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $920,000?

Bob, I understand you're working within a budget, but $920,000 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $935,000. This is a very fair price considering the product's value, and it's closer to what I need. Let's make this happen.
